private_key_openssl: testdata/keys/rsa-openssl.pem
private_key_openssh: testdata/keys/rsa-openssh.pem

Test setting private key from unencrypted configuration.

>>> config.ini.before
[gotp "issuer"]
test1 = SHA1:a:6:30:
test2 = SHA1:b:6:30:
test3 = SHA1:c:6:30:
test4 = SHA1:d:6:30:
test5 = SHA1:e:6:30:

[gotp]
private_key =

<<< issuers
test1 = SHA1:a:6:30:
test2 = SHA1:b:6:30:
test3 = SHA1:c:6:30:
test4 = SHA1:d:6:30:
test5 = SHA1:e:6:30:
